top.title: Trump revokes landmark ruling that greenhouse gases endanger public health
top.summary: The White House calls it the largest deregulation in US history, but environmentalists say it will prove costly for Americans.

top.title: Analysis: Trump takes victory lap after biggest climate rollback yet
top.summary: The move marks the culmination of a decade-long push by the president to tear up climate policies he argues stifle industry.

top.title: Minnesota immigration enforcement surge is ending, Trump border tsar says
top.summary: Two US citizens were killed in Minneapolis during the crackdown dubbed "Operation Metro Surge".

top.title: AI coding platform's flaws allow BBC reporter to be hacked
top.summary: Vibe-coding tools - which let people without coding skills create apps using AI - are exploding in popularity.

top.title: Porn site fined £800,000 for not rolling out age checks
top.summary: Separately, message board 4chan says it will refuse to pay an expected £520,000 fine from the media regulator.

top.title: AI safety leader says 'world is in peril' and quits to study poetry
top.summary: It comes in the same week an OpenAI researcher resigned amid concerns about its decision to start testing ChatGPT ads.
